short_description: towa denki is an electronical components manufacturer based in gongshu district, china.
long_description: we provide the products and services to meet our customers' needs. we behave with high standards of business ethics to meet the reliance and anticipation of the society. we perform the business at highest level of transparency and create the corporate culture with fairness and vitality. shikoku business office established (now, shikoku branch). akita local office established (now, akita office). towa trading (s) pte. towa denki (thai) co., ltd. established in thailand. towa denki taiwan sirius corp., a joint venture company established in taiwan. tianjin office established in tianjin.
business_tags: sales of electronics | electrical and wiring | sale of electricity | electronic chemicals | electrical & electronics | synthetic resins
generated_description: towa denki, legally known as towa denki co. ltd., is a specialized trading company based in hồ chí minh city, vietnam. established in 1946, the company operates in various sectors including home appliances, automotive, information and communication, and eco-energy. towa denki provides a wide range of materials such as electrical and electronic materials, chemical materials, metal materials, synthetic resin raw materials, industrial films and molded products, and various types of wires and wire products. the company is known for its flexible market expansion, logistics, and production proposals, leveraging its extensive experience and network to deliver optimal solutions to its clients.
